Name: vacrelid
column6: the table this entry is for

Name: enabled
column6: if false, this table will not be autovacuumed, except to prevent transaction id wraparound

Name: vac_base_thresh
column6: minimum number of modified tuples before vacuum

Name: vac_scale_factor
column6: multiplier for reltuples to add to vac_base_thresh

Name: anl_base_thresh
column6: minimum number of modified tuples before analyze

Name: anl_scale_factor
column6: multiplier for reltuples to add to anl_base_thresh
